title: Girl's tear ducts were ripped out during 2nd mauling by her mom's favorite dog
text:
Kayla Price was charged with child abuse after letting her pet pit bull maul her eight year-old daughter a second time. The second attack left the little girl needing 27 stitches, and with permanently-damaged tear ducts

An eight year-old girl’s tear ducts were ripped out during a second mauling from a pit bull her mother previously refused to give up.

The unnamed youngster required 27 stitches to close the wounds inflicted by her 26 year-old mother Kayla Price’s pet dog Zeus.

Her cheek, chin and eye were all lacerated by the animal’s fangs during the attack in Springville, Utah, in June, with the child likely to be physically scarred for life.

And the youngster’s tear ducts were so badly savaged by Zeus that they are now permanently damaged, according to doctors.

A probable cause statement seen by Gephardt Daily said: ‘(The) victim — an 8-year-old girl — was bitten by the family pit bull.

The dog, named Zeus, was finally put down after the second attack on Price’s eight year-old daughter

‘She was taken to the hospital where she received 27 stitches on her cheek, on her chin, and around her eye.

‘The injuries have left scarring and possible permanent damage to the tear ducts.

‘This is at least the second time that the dog has bitten a victim on the face.

‘The dog has bit other children in the past as well, yet the defendant insists on bringing the dog back into the family home.’

Explaining the decision to charge Price, Springville Police Chief Craig Martinez told ABC4: ‘We felt the evidence showed a little bit of neglect and that this had happened once before and that no plan of action was taken and nothing was changed.

‘We respond to dog bites all the time.

‘Usually you see it once.

‘It doesn’t usually happen again with the same animal and the same child or children.

‘In this case the second time was too much.’

After the dog was put down, a Facebook post made by a man believed to be Price’s husband was posted moaning that it was the ‘saddest day losing my first kid and best friend.’
description: Kayla Price has been charged with child abuse after refusing to give up an aggressive pit bull which then went on to attack her young daughter a second time
